details.description: Viacoin (VIA) is a cryptocurrency. Users are able to generate VIA through the process of mining. Viacoin has a current supply of 23,163,449.824. The last known price of Viacoin is $0.187001 USD and is down -0.18% over the last 24 hours. It is currently trading on 9 active market(s) with $131,580.342 traded over the last 24 hours. More information can be found at http://viacoin.org.
